kpi.name: M1006C120

kpi_info.title: RRC RE-ESTABLISH FAIL NO REPLY NRT
kpi_info.use: The number of failed RRC connection re-establishments due to the UE not replying to an RRC: CELL UPDATE CONFIRM sent by RNC. When the RNC does not receive any reply to an RRC: CELL UPDATE CONFIRM sent to the UE during a CELL UPDATE procedure initiated with cause "Radio link failure".

kpi.kpi_alias: RRC RE-ESTABLISH FAIL NO REPLY NRT
